reviewText: This movie is now on bluray by CODE RED!
As a racer myself I loved this movie as a kid. I only wish they would bring it out on DVD. Great movie!!!
I was looking for this video for a long time and when I found it in here I was amazad.  great quality for a vhs,  can I even say that I still have a vhs...haha
Great movie, Classic 80's movie set up an delivery.
graet movie in good condition never released on dvd

We really enjoyed Race for Glory with Alex McArthur.  He is an incredible actor and in everything we have seen him in he makes the character so real.  We thoroughly enjoy his work and wish he made more movies.

This is a movie for motorcycle and race enthusiasts especially.  Although, anyone who likes action and drama would enjoy it as well. I was impressed with the race footage and the realism of it. The storyline is interesting also. The acting is good but not great. Not a movie for everyone and not a masterpiece, but a solid fun and interesting movie.
